mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_tel, member_post, member_base_address, member_detail_address, member_birth, member_gender) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberTel}, #{memberPost}, #{memberBaseAddress}, #{memberDetailAddress}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender})
mapper.select: select *from member order by member_joindate asc

select*from member
where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${type} asc
select files_no from member_img where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set member_point=member_point+#{memberPoint} where member_id=#{memberId}
